attributes.additional_details: As seen on TV programme  "Unreported World". There is a thriving trade for Stealing dogs for food in Vietnam. Subjecting these dogs to unbelievable cruelty. Not only with the clubbing and then cutting the dogs throats but also transporting them to the factory in the trucks, this image will  haunt anyone who has seen this image. The Government should send a letter of protest to the Government of Vietnam.
